function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of large scale quasi-experimental studies on the effectiveness of UBPI in the clinical setting","Impact":"Uncertainty about the true effectiveness of UBPI in addressing psychological needs","Mitigation":"Conducting large scale quasi-experimental studies to validate the effectiveness of UBPI","Technologies":"Research methodologies for quasi-experimental studies","People":"Practitioners, mental health service users","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges in delivering mental health services during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased difficulty in providing face-to-face psychological services, limitations in capacity and resources","Mitigation":"Adopting progressive and dynamic approaches for emergency psychological crisis intervention services, forming expert groups to provide professional input","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, digital mental health tools","People":"Mental health practitioners, health authorities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of freedom of movement and face-to-face service provision","Impact":"Limitations in access to traditional psychological services","Mitigation":"Implementing alternative delivery methods for psychological services, such as teletherapy and online counseling","Technologies":"Teletherapy platforms, online counseling software","People":"Mental health service users, practitioners","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, mental health providers"}]}
